entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:17 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 8:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 0.6°C
Wind: ENE 39 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
